name: whale, narwhal, dolphin
notes:
free pattern available as video tutorial on my blog: https://www.sweetsofties.com/2023/03/flipper-friends.html

crochet kit available at: https://yarnsea.com/en/project/2121/flipper-friends-amigurumi

the 3-in-1 flipper friends pattern includes instructions for crocheting a pocket whale, narwhal, and dolphin! all three sea animal patterns are completely no-sew, meaning they’re all crocheted in one piece. this quick and beginner-friendly amigurumi project comes with photo references and a full video tutorial. these cute, fishy creatures can be made into a keychain, or kept as a squishy plush with super bulky blanket yarn or velvet yarn.  it is great as a last-minute birthday gift, christmas or holiday gift, or as party favors or craft fair products.  kids and children alike will adore these marine creatures! 

**materials**
* hobbii baby snuggle yarn or honey bunny yarn (super bulky weight #6) in desired colors (yarn i used: https://hobbii.mvk.co/2g8s4)
* 9mm plastic safety eyes (x2)
* 5mm crochet hook
* stuffing
* scissors 

**size**
length: 4” (10 cm) 

**level**
★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner. requires familiarity with stitches used (below), changing colors, and attaching yarn.

**stitches & techniques used (us terminology)**
fo = fasten off
ch = chain
sl st = slip stitch
sc = single crochet
inc = increase (insert 2 sc in same st)
dec = decrease (sc 2 sts together)
hdc = half double crochet
dc = double crochet
blo = back loops only
